channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: DJI Neo 2 review: I guess I’m a drone guy now
item.description: I'm not a drone guy. In fact, I've always been a bit nervous to play around with them too much. They're big, fragile, and expensive, which is a dangerous combination for someone with my hand-eye coordination. But I've always sort of wanted one, mostly because I've been jealous of the mid-air photos and videos I've […]

item.title: Samsung met le paquet pour la 2e démarque des soldes d’hiver : le TOP 14 des offres
item.description: Les appareils Samsung ne sont pas épargnés pendant la deuxième démarque des soldes. Envie d'un nouveau TV QLED stylé ? Un smartphone à clapet ou bien d'un écran Ultra Wide OLED ? C'est ce qu'on retrouve dans cette sélection de produit du géant sud-coréen.

item.title: YouTube now has a way for parents to block kids from watching Shorts
item.description: Parents will be able toggle the Shorts time limit on connected children's accounts.

item.title: Animal Crossing’s big 3.0 update has fans itching to return to the cozy life
item.description: Animal Crossing, like Kirby, has come back when it seems like the world needs it most. In 2020, Animal Crossing: New Horizons released on the Nintendo Switch. The game instantly became a smash hit, providing a much-needed place to safely gather with friends amidst the global shutdown of the covid-19 pandemic. In the almost six […]

item.title: Archaeologists Uncover Gigantic Medieval Ship With Features Seen Only on Paper
item.description: The shipwreck is exceptionally preserved and provides the first archaeological confirmation of features seen in illustrations.

item.title: Oubliez les fauteuils gaming : voici la chaise de bureau ergonomique qui prend (vraiment) soin du dos [Sponso]
item.description: Si pendant un temps les chaises orientées gaming ont eu le vent en poupe, nombreux sont les utilisateurs à revenir à des fauteuils plus sobres, mieux conçus et plus durables. La Doro C300 de Sihoo s’inscrit complètement dans cette nouvelle tendance.

item.title: Ce SSD WD_Black de 4 To est à 355 € au lieu de 1 069 € : profitez des soldes avant la flambée des prix
item.description: Avoir le plus de place possible sur votre PC ou votre PS5, ça devient compliqué avec les prix qui s'envolent déjà. Heureusement que les soldes d'hiver 2026 sont là et qu'elles font passer le SSD WD_Black SN850X 4 To à 355 euros sur Amazon alors qu'il est affiché à 1 069 euros chez le fabricant.

item.title: YouTube adds more parental controls, including a way to block teens from watching Shorts
item.description: YouTube is rolling out some additional parental controls, including a way to set time limits for viewing Shorts on teen accounts. In the near future, parents and guardians will be able to set the Shorts timer to zero on supervised accounts. "This is an industry-first feature that puts parents firmly in control of the amount of short-form content their kids watch," Jennifer Flannery O'Connor, YouTube's vice president of product management, wrote in a blog post. Along with that, take-a-break and bedtime reminders are now enabled by default for users aged 13-17. The platform is also bringing in n...

item.title: Microsoft might have just leaked Forza Horizon 6’s release date
item.description: Microsoft is getting ready to show the first gameplay of Forza Horizon 6 next week, and it might also be ready to put a date on its release, too. X poster Xbox Infinite claims they received a Forza Horizon 6 preorder notification inside Forza Horizon 5, implying that the release date of the new title […]

item.title: I’m a backup and recovery provider, but here’s why you shouldn’t just trust me
item.description: In factories and hospitals, backup systems fail silently every day. Here's what vendors won't tell you.

item.title: AI is no SKU—and what that means for the enterprise
item.description: Buying AI is easy but turning it into business value is where most organizations fail.

item.title: Our favorite 3-in-1 wireless charger from UGreen is 32 percent off right now
item.description:
You can easily spruce up your nightstand or desk by decluttering a bit, replacing some of those annoying charging cables with a good wireless charging setup. One of our favorites that can handle three devices at once is the UGREEN MagFlow Qi2 3-in-1 Charger Station 25W. Normally $140, it's on sale right now for $95; that's 32 percent off and only about $5 more than its record-low price.
This is our top pick for a 3-in-1 charging pad thanks to its versatility. The UGREEN can work equally well as a permanent fixture in your home or act as a portable charging station. It boasts a foldable desig...

item.title: In Photos: One Week Since the Shooting of Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis
item.description: Protests across Minnesota—and around the country—are ongoing, as residents demonstrate against their federal government.

item.title: Galaxy S26 : Samsung corrigerait enfin le plus gros défaut du petit smartphone
item.description: Cela fait maintenant des années que Samsung réserve les vraies nouveautés de charge au modèle Ultra. Une nouvelle fuite laisse entendre que le Galaxy S26 pourrait, lui aussi, enfin accélérer sérieusement côté batterie.

item.title: Tesla will only offer subscriptions for Full Self-Driving (Supervised) going forward
item.description: It's a huge change to Tesla's approach with FSD, and it could impact Musk's $1T pay package and the company's myriad legal troubles.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, January 15 (game #949)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Thursday, January 15 (game #683)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Thursday, January 15 (game #1452)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Après la RAM, un autre élément vital pour les puces va faire grimper les prix
item.description: Si encore il n'y avait que la mémoire qui posait problème. Mais d'autres composants électroniques prisés par l'industrie de l'IA font aussi défaut aux constructeurs d'appareils électroniques. Apple et tous les autres doivent ainsi se battre pour obtenir du tissu de fibre de verre, un élément indispensable pour les circuits imprimés des puces.

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2025 year in review is finally here
item.description: We’re almost exactly halfway through January, but Nintendo has clearly taken a better-late-than-never approach to its 2025 year in review feature, which finally went live this week for Switch and Switch 2 users. All you need to do is head here and sign into your Nintendo account to see your 2025 breakdown. Like most annual gaming wrap-ups, Nintendo's shows how many games you played over the calendar year, as well as your total playtime. It also shows you your most-played titles for each month, your preferred genres by percentage, and if you scroll all the way to the bottom you can choose your ...

item.title: Security researchers warn Telegram links can doxx you – even with a VPN
item.description: A simple click on a disguised link could reveal your real IP address to attackers. Researchers warn that this Telegram flaw overrides internal proxy and VPN settings, putting privacy-focused users at risk.

item.title: I've tested the cool and colorful Ninja BlendBOSS, and making silky smoothies has bever been so much fun
item.description: Whip up your favorite smoothies and shakes at home, then take them anywhere with the BlendBOSS's 26oz travel tumbler.

item.title: Amazon Prime Video ajoute gratuitement les chaînes de M6+ à son catalogue
item.description: La coupe du monde de football et Top Chef directement depuis Prime Video.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros : Netflix modifierait son offre pour écarter définitivement Paramount
item.description: Alors que Paramount multiplie les actions pour s'accaparer Warner Bros, Netflix réagirait. L'entreprise songerait à modifier son offre de rachat pour écarter la menace de Paramount.

item.title: « C’est si nul… Je n’arrive pas à y croire ! » : Même GOG en a marre de Windows
item.description: Le nouveau propriétaire de GOG manque de mots tendres pour Windows. Il annonce que ses équipes travaillent au support de Linux en 2026.

item.title: These are the best laptop deals available this week in the US and UK — 14 of the top offers I'd buy with Black Friday behind us
item.description: I've rounded up all of the best laptop deals available this week in the US and the UK, including everything from bargain Chromebooks to high-performance powerhouses.

item.title: VPN interest spikes in Uganda as the internet gets disrupted ahead of the general elections
item.description: Despite the blocked access to the public internet, people in Uganda seem to be using VPNs to stay connected. Proton VPN confirmed a 8,000% increase in signups on Tuesday, and usage keeps rising.

item.title: ServiceNow patches critical security flaw which could allow user impersonation
item.description: The bug is dubbed "BodySnatcher" and was given a severity score of 9.3/10.

item.title: NBC Sports’ new real-time player tracking lets viewers focus on their favorite athletes
item.description: NBC Sports introduced a new AI-powered player tracking system that will let viewers on mobile devices zoom in and focus on their favorite athletes. It's the first time the viztrick AiDi technology, which was developed by Japan's Nippon Television Network, will be used by another broadcaster. NBC Sports plans to implement the feature for its […]

item.title: This four-star smart ring is a 'cheap alternative to Oura and Samsung' — and it just dropped to its best price since Black Friday on Amazon
item.description: The RingConn Gen 2 is one of the best smart rings if you're on a budget, and t's even cheaper today thanks to this Amazon deal.

item.title: Pixel 9 Pro : l’ancienne gloire de Google revient à un super prix pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Le Pixel 9 Pro est l'ancien smartphone haut de gamme de Google, mais il reste un excellent choix en 2026, surtout pour la partie photo. On le trouve sur Boulanger à 669 euros au lieu de 1 199 euros à l'occasion des offres des soldes d'hiver.

item.title: This billionaire tax proposal has tech titans threatening to leave California
item.description: Almost half of California’s personal income tax revenue comes from the state’s top 1% of earners. A proposed billionaires’ tax in California has ignited a political uproar in Silicon Valley, with tech titans threatening to leave the state while Democratic Gov. Gavin Newsom maneuvers to defeat a levy that he fears will lead to an exodus of wealth.A technology mecca, California has more billionaires than any other state — a few hundred, by some estimates. Nearly half its personal income tax revenue, a financial backbone in the nearly $350 billion budget, comes from the top 1% of earners.A large ...

item.title: Xiaomi se donne à fond pour la 2e démarque des soldes : les 13 offres avec un rapport qualité-prix imbattable
item.description: Xiaomi continue de régaler durant les soldes : la firme chinoise dégaine des offres alléchantes sur l'ensemble de son catalogue de produits, et même les plus récents. Voici les meilleurs deals de la 2e démarque.

item.title: Pick up Apple's 25W MagSafe charger while it's down to $30
item.description:
If you want a wireless charger for your iPhone and prefer to stick with Apple, Amazon has a sale that may pique your interest. The retailer is selling the one meter Apple Magsafe charger for $30, saving you $10 off the regular price, while also selling the two meter model for $40 ($10 off).
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone to get the fastest MagSafe charging speeds, the charger can wirelessly top up the battery of any iPhone from...

item.title: Optoma dévoile le vidéoprojecteur Photon Beam PK52 avec technologie laser 4K à relier à une source externe
item.description: Optoma lance le Photon Beam PK52, un projecteur laser 4K UHD destiné au home cinéma, qui sera présenté officiellement au salon ISE 2026 à Barcelone.

item.title: Millions Used Their Computers to Search for Aliens. Now Scientists Have 100 Signals Worth a Closer Look
item.description: For 21 years, the SETI@home project tapped personal computers to analyze unusual radio signals from space.

item.title: Animal Crossing’s 3.0 update dropped a little early
item.description: Animal Crossing fans looking to return to the cozy island life can do so earlier than expected. While New Horizons' next major update, which brings the life sim game to version 3.0, was originally slated to launch on January 15th, it's now available to download. To be clear, this is not the paid Switch 2 […]

item.title: Nouvelle fuite massive : 45 millions de données françaises exposées sur Internet, dont des infos bancaires
item.description: Une base de données géante, contenant jusqu’à 45 millions d’enregistrements de citoyens français, a été laissée en libre accès sur Internet. La fuite expose des données personnelles, bancaires, d’assurance et de santé.

item.title: Tesla to stop selling FSD as a standalone package and switch to subscription only
item.description: As its sales continue to slip and its robotaxi strategy seems to falter, Tesla CEO Elon Musk said today that the company would stop selling its Full Self-Driving feature as a standalone package. Instead, starting on February 14th, the Level 2 driver-assist system would be offered as a monthly subscription only. The news marks a […]

item.title: James Cameron Teases Michelle Yeoh’s Mysterious Future ‘Avatar’ Character
item.description: Plus, Simon prepares for a scene read in another new teaser for 'Wonder Man'.

item.title: Honda relaunching Acura RDX as a next-gen two-motor hybrid
item.description: Honda announced that the next-generation Acura RDX will be the brand's first SUV to feature a two-motor hybrid system. While this next-gen platform is under development, Honda said it would suspend production of the current RDX, which launched in 2018 and has sold nearly 740,000 units in the US. Honda confirmed that current RDX production […]

item.title: Nvidia’s new app update includes DLSS 4.5 and more Control Panel features
item.description: Nvidia is rolling out a new app update today that includes its latest DLSS 4.5 Super Resolution and Nvidia Surround settings. DLSS 4.5 includes Nvidia's second-generation Super Resolution transformer model, designed to improve image quality and reduce the artifacting found in DLSS 4. While DLSS 4.5 was available in the beta version of the Nvidia […]...

item.title: NVIDIA rolls out DLSS 4.5 to all RTX GPUs
item.description: Just a week after announcing the latest version of its image-upscaling tech at CES, NVIDIA is rolling out DLSS 4.5. The company released a beta version of the update last week. Starting today, all NVIDIA app users with a GeForce RTX GPU will be able to upgrade to the full release of DLSS 4.5.NVIDIA says DLSS 4.5 Super Resolution (to give its full name) delivers sharper visuals and improved temporal stability. The 2nd Generation Super Resolution Transformer reduces ghosting and improves anti-aliasing in more than 400 games and apps, the company claims. "This second-generation model is our most ...

item.title: Detroit’s streetlights are becoming EV chargers
item.description: Instead of digging up the sidewalk to add new EV charging wires, Voltpost Air simply attaches to existing streetlights. In a parking lot in Detroit next to the Henry Ford Museum, three streetlights now double as EV chargers.

item.title: Apple’s new Creator Studio isn’t just about getting you to subscribe to apps
item.description: Yes, the company is turning software into a service. But its new creativity bundle also helps clarify its strategy around pro tools, AI, the iPad, and more. On the surface, Apple’s announcement on Tuesday of a subscription service called Apple Creator Studio does not demand a whole lot of explanation or analysis. The Mac/iPad/iPhone offering, which bundles the Final Cut Pro video editor, Logic Pro audio editor, Pixelmator Pro image editor, and other apps for making and manipulating media for $13 a month or $129 a year, is exactly the sort of thing you’d expect the company to get around to intr...

item.title: The price of gold and silver just hit another record. This time, the reason is different—and worrisome
item.description: Turmoil abroad and politically charged events here at home appear to be pushing investors further toward safe-haven assets in 2026. One thing has become reliable over the past year of worldwide uncertainty: the price of gold and silver has continued to rise.

item.title: Monarch Money deal: New users can get one year of access for only $50
item.description: A new year is the perfect time to get your spending in order, and if you're not trying to build your own spreadsheet, budgeting apps are one of the best ways to do it. To save yourself some money in the process, you can pick up a year-long subscription to Monarch Money, one of Engadget's favorite budgeting apps, for just $50 if you use code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout and you're a new subscriber. That's a 50 percent discount on the service's normal $100 price. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, a...

item.title: Pourquoi cette carte mère est hors-norme et la preuve que le PC fixe est en train de changer
item.description: La BD395i MAX. C'est une carte Mini-ITX qui embarque le monstrueux AMD Strix Halo et 128 Go de RAM. Et, elle est unique en son genre.

item.title: The structure of this sentence is a dead giveaway that AI wrote it
item.description: Forget lists of words and punctuation marks. If you really want to know if a text was written by AI, look for this particular sentence structure. For as long as people have been using AI to churn out text, other people have been coming up with “tells” that something was written by AI. Sometimes it’s punctuation that comes under suspicion. (The em dash is generally considered the shadiest.) Other times it’s words that robot writers seem to love and overuse. ...

item.title: Fender's guitar lessons are coming to Samsung TVs later this year
item.description: We’ve all heard of couch surfing, but Fender and Samsung have made it their 2026 mission to make couch shredding a thing. Samsung TV users will soon be able to take guitar lessons from the comfort of their living rooms, with the first TV edition of the Fender Play app set to arrive in the first half of this year. Debuted at CES, players can choose from video-based lessons for both electric and acoustic guitar, as well as bass and — for all the wannabe Jake Shimabukuros or George Formbys (one for the Brits) among you — the ukulele. There are on-demand courses for different levels of skill, with...

item.title: Musique générée par IA : Bandcamp tranche et c’est non
item.description: Bandcamp a choisi son camp, et ce n'est pas celui de l'IA générative. La plateforme musicale refuse désormais les morceaux entièrement générés ou en grande partie générés par IA. Une clarification attendue par de nombreux utilisateurs du service, mais aussi par les artistes.

item.title: La Suunto 9 Peak Pro est soldée à -60 % : une montre idéale pour les sportifs au budget serré
item.description: Proposée à seulement 199 euros au lieu de 499 euros pendant les soldes d'hiver, la Suunto 9 Peak Pro devient une vraie bonne affaire et se trouve être un choix malin pour les runners et traileurs au budget serré.

item.title: Docusign wants to use AI to turn your complex contracts into plain English
item.description: Docusign is using AI to help consumers summarize and interact with contracts in a way that they can actually understand.

item.title: Lighten up: 2026 is the year of the ultra-ultraportable Windows laptop
item.description: Almost every PC maker debuted a new ultra-thin and lightweight Windows laptop at CES 2026.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones gaming en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous êtes en quête d'un bon smartphone gaming ? Grâce à cette sélection, vous trouverez le modèle de téléphone qu'il vous faut pour jouer à des jeux exigeants tels que Fortnite, PUBG ou Genshin Impact.

item.title: Amazon multiplie les offres à la 2e démarque des soldes : le TOP 18 des deals
item.description: Amazon réserve parfois ses meilleures offres pour ses membres Prime, mais pendant les soldes d'hiver, tout le monde peut profiter des réductions du géant américain. Découvrez ici les deals qui valent le coup à la 2e démarque.

item.title: Bandcamp prohibits music made ‘wholly or in substantial part’ by AI
item.description: Bandcamp has addressed the AI slop problem vexing musicians and their fans of late. The company is banning any music or audio on its platform that is "wholly or in substantial part" made by generative AI, according to its blog. It also clarified that the use of AI tools to impersonate other artists or styles is “strictly prohibited” by policies already in place. Any music suspected to be AI generated may be removed by the Bandcamp team and the company is giving users reporting tools to flag such content. "We believe that the human connection found through music is a vital part of our society a...
